SALSubsystem.Name: DIMM
SALSubsystem.Description: CSC for the DIMM (Differential Image Motion Monitor) telescope
SALSubsystem.SoftwareLanguage: Python for high level, Java for low level

SALSubsystem.Name: DREAM
SALSubsystem.Description: CSC for the DREAM (Dutch Rubin Enhanced Atmospheric Monitor) all-sky camera.

SALSubsystem.Name: ATDome
SALSubsystem.Description: Control the Auxiliary Telelescope dome, including azimuth and shutter doors.
SALSubsystem.VendorContact: The control system consists of an in house CSC that talks over TCP/IP to a low-level controller written by Astronomical Consulting Equipment.

SALSubsystem.Name: ATDomeTrajectory
SALSubsystem.Description: Command the auxiliary telescope dome (ATDome) to follow the telescope.

SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Auxiliary Telescope Mount Control System

SALSubsystem.Name: ATPneumatics
SALSubsystem.Description: Controls the support system for the mirrors on the Auxtel

SALSubsystem.Description: Controls the Hexpod that positions the secondary mirror of the Aux tel

SALSubsystem.Name: ATMonochromator
SALSubsystem.Description: Controls the monochromator for the AT calibration system

SALSubsystem.Description: Controls the white light source for the AT calibration system.

SALSubsystem.Name: Script
SALSubsystem.Description: A "SAL script" that performs some action using SAL and then quits. SAL Scripts are managed by the ScriptQueue.

SALSubsystem.Name: ScriptQueue
SALSubsystem.Description: A CSC that manages SAL Scripts (see the Script subsystem).

SALSubsystem.Name: FiberSpectrograph
SALSubsystem.Description: A CSC that manages the Fiber Spectrographs that are used to measure the calibration light sources.

SALSubsystem.Name: MTDomeTrajectory
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Main Telescope Dome Trajectory

SALSubsystem.Name: MTEEC
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Environmental Enclosure Component

SALSubsystem.Name: GenericCamera
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for the Generic Camera

SALSubsystem.Name: Guider
SALSubsystem.Description: Guider CSC.

SALSubsystem.Name: Test
SALSubsystem.Description: A SAL component designed to support testing SAL itself.

SALSubsystem.Name: Watcher
SALSubsystem.Description: A CSC that listens other CSCs and uses that data to produces alarms for the user interface.

SALSubsystem.Name: SummitFacility
SALSubsystem.Description: The CSC for controlling the summit facility of the main telescope

SALSubsystem.Name: DSM
SALSubsystem.Description: CSC for transmitting information from the Dome Seeing Monitor

SALSubsystem.Description: Publication of data from digital devices measuring relative physical displacement as a function of time.
